```

Create a historical or fantasy setting in which a character must seek or answer the question
"<insert base question>". Remember, it must have the same meaning. Make the text so that
"you" are the character. For example: "You are a pirate that...", "You are Sherlock Holmes...",
"You are a guerrilla member that...", "You are a mage elf that...", or others. Make the text
so that at the end it presents the question to the character, without answering yourself.
```
